value:
That jackass said I would look good in
a dress! Next time he screws with me
like that, he's a dead man. Got it?

My father is a skilled mercenary, but
a lousy gambler. Sure as hell doesn't
stop him from tryin', though.

I've watched my father lose enough
times to know the score—the house
always wins. Everyone else? Losers.$k$pIf that's your thing, just make sure it
doesn't get outta hand.

I just want my old man to be happy.
Money lost to bets can be earned
back, but there's no replacin' him.

Of course you can't make sense of
my techniques. It's not like they're
proper "martial style" or whatever.$k$pIt's all just for show—movements
meant to dazzle the untrained eye.

The name's Malice.
I'm $Nf's merc.
...Oh yeah, I was told to give you this.

If you want me to keep working, I'm
gonna need to see some coin. Let's
say...590 gold. That'll do the trick.

Long as you keep paying, I'll keep
workin'. Simple as that.
Damn it... Botched the landing.

Hell yeah! I'd expect no less from ya.
Misers are no fun to work with.

I'm Malice. My sword doesn't come
cheap, so I hope whoever's in charge
here has their finances in order.

You never thought twice about
a woman like me choosing the
sellsword life, did you?$k$pNormally, people can't help sayin'
something. But it's not all bad...$k$pHell, one time someone told me that
my blade danced like shooting stars!$k$pCan you believe that? No matter what
world you're in, I guess some people
just have a way with words...$k$pI'm not one of 'em, so I'll keep it
simple: I'll follow you wherever you
go. It's fun keepin' ya company.$k$pBut in return... Let's see, what should
I have you do?$k$p...Got it. I want you to praise
me more, $Nu.$k$pThe words that spill outta your mouth
aren't half-bad, so feel free to get
started right away!
でやっ
Too slow
ぐっ…
So strong...!
This'll cost ya.
Don't work for free!
Earnin' my keep!
It's just a job.
Got a lot to learn...
Hmph
I'm Malice, a mercenary. Want to hire me? It don't come cheap.
Hey now! What do you think you're doing?
I try to save up, but...the moment the money comes in, it goes back out again. My old man and his gambling...
Ogma? That man saved us. He gave us food when we were dyin'.
Got a question for ya. Is Prince Alfonse good about paying people what they're owed?
Hmmm... If I want to eat tomorrow, I've got to get my hands on some money today...
Nah, I don't mind showing you how I swing a sword. Hell, I won't even charge ya.
Yeah.
What?
Time to make money.
